statements: DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression'
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression';
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE accuracy > 0.8 AND recall < 0.6;
DELETE FROM model_performance_metrics WHERE model_name = 'Decision Tree';
DELETE FROM model_evaluation_data WHERE actual_class = 0 AND evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM model_evaluation WHERE metric_value <= 0.5 AND evaluation_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ModelMetrics WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression';
DELETE FROM TrainingData WHERE model_id = 3 AND data_point = 100;
